doc.field: Reformed Protestant Dutch Church of Flatbush land lease to the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush
Reformed Protestant Dutch Church of Flatbush land lease to the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush

One 1848 lease between the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Flatbush and the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush, providing for the building and continued use of a common school on church-owned land in Flatbush School District No. 1.

One 1848 lease between the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Flatbush and the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush, providing for the building and continued use of a common school on church-owned land in Flatbush School District No. 1.

Lease between the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Flatbush and the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush, providing for the building and continued use of a common school on church-owned land in Flatbush School District No. 1. The document is dated January 1, 1848.
